Video Collection: 2017 Vail Hip Symposium

Watch presentations recorded at the 2017 Vail Hip Symposium on January 12-14, 2017. The faculty consisted of leading arthroscopic and sports medicine surgeons discussing a range of current hip arthroscopy topics.



2017 Vail Hip Symposium
with the Steadman Philippon Research Institute

Westin Riverfront Resort, Vail, CO, USA
January 12-14, 2017

    Mr Richard Villar (UK).
